author: Bill
content:
Andreas, I'm a Mac user and the samples play fine on my machine.

I like this image for the converging lines and the way the warm light plays on the buildings and the street itself. Love the tilt but those pesky wires bother me. The angle of the sign for 'La Francheria' is a bit of a distraction as it is working against all the other lines but that's really nitpicking.

Thanks for your continued visits to my photoblog- much appreciated
